alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marion and central Putnam Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Delancy, or 10 miles southeast of Interlachen, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, East Palatka, Lake Delancy, Bardin, San Mateo, Satsuma and Welaka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam
